process.label: Capture expense receipts through mobile app
process.content: Capture or upload the expense receipt through the mobile app. Our AI model will analyze the bill for its authenticity, accuracy, completeness, relevance, and other metrics. This generates an AI score for further processes.

process.label: Create and manage expense reports
process.content: Reports can be created by mapping the appropriate expenses. Reports can be regular or event based. The user can edit draft reports before finally submitting for approval.

process.label: Submit reports for approval
